transcript:
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji, kis se baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Ji sir, ji sir.
Customer: Hello. Haan.
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Ji sir, wo actually aapka ek sir se email aaya hai. To mere senior aaye the mere se puchne ke liye. Kyunki maine unko ye bataya tha na ki aapke kuch owner hai jo ki Australia gaye hue hai isliye aap log access nahi kar pa rahe ho. Shayad aapka hi email gaya hai customer care se jahan pe aapne likha hai ki aapka jo phone number aur email id associated hai. To uska wo lost ho gaya hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aur hum aap log under process ho apna number email id change karwane.
Customer: Hmm. Haan owner ko.
Executive: Aur otherwise close my ads on your portal and give my refund. Ye do option aapne diya hai.
Customer: Accountant ko bola, haan accountant ko bola tha unhone ki is cheez ko aap dekhiye isko fix karwaiye to unhone mail vel kiya hoga.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To sir matlab kya hai matlab ki kya number kho gaya hai ki wo wahin pe available nahi hai abhi isliye nahi ho pa raha?
Customer: Ab ye cheez ye nayi cheez aap mujhe khud aap hi bata rahe hain mere ko nahi malum hai aap mere ko puchna padega ki kya unhone mail dala hai nahi dala.
Executive: Sir ek email id aaya hai sir, ek email aaya hai aap hi ke email se aata hai sir owner sarkari karke hai na. Wahi abhi ki email hai sir GST mail jo waha pe likh.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Main main padh ke bata de raha hu sir. Sir GST registered mobile number with email id has been lost with phone and you are not able to recover it. We are trying to update a new phone number and email id with the GST number but it's under process. Once we have fixed it we will update it but please give me access until GST verified with OTP. Iske alawa problem is going on. Please fix the problem if you can otherwise close my ads on your portal and give me give my refund. Thanks and regards GST.
Customer: Haan, theek hai.
Executive: Haan ji, to aap hi email kya hai sir ye wala. Jo batana tha unhone aapko mail ke through bata hi diya hai ye ab humne.
Customer: Unhone matlab kaun? Ye unhone unhone matlab sir kaun hai ye?
Customer: Hain?
Customer: Matlab aap bol rahe hain na unhone matlab aapne mail nahi kiya kisne mail kiya sir?
Executive: Nahi ye mail humne nahi kiya hai accountant sir ne accountant sir ne kiya hoga.
Customer: Aapne ye email nahi kiya hai sir?
Executive: Nahi humne nahi kiya hai hum ye mail thodi na kiye hain. Accountant sir company ke humne senior ko bola tha na ki is is tarah ki baatein abhi fix nahi ho pai hai aap log GST verify karne ki requirement aage se aa rahi hai, theek hai na? Kyunki hum to yaha pe company mein job kar rahe hain na to fir yaha pe hum is tarah team. Bilkul aap job kar rahe hain sir.
Customer: To sir ye kisne kiya hoga main wahi jaanna chah raha hu ki ye wo theek hai sir aapke owner hai pata rehna kya.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Owner ne accountant ko bola hoga na accountant sir ne kiya hoga.
Executive: To wo mail se baat kar rahe hain hai na? Aur baki phone aur us pe reachable nahi hai WhatsApp pe.
Customer: Hain? Email pe reachable hai wo. Main bol raha hu email pe baat kar rahe hain wo phone aur WhatsApp pe reachable nahi hai is time pe.
Executive: Nahi isse pehle jo mail gayi thi wo baki cheeze to humne kari hui thi baki ye cheez to hamare end se nahi hua beech mein kiye hain wo wahi jaante hain. Kaise jo aapke accountant ye jo aapke accountant hain accountant ne kiya hoga sir. Hai na email. Accountant ke sath phone pe reachable hai wo aap usse thodi na baat hoti hai sir wo to owner baat karte hain na.
Executive: To owner se sir main wahi bol raha hu ki hamari is par baat aap nahi karwa sakte hain kya?
Customer: Kinse?
Executive: Humse sir IndiaMART se.
Executive: To main unke bihaf pe to baat hi kar raha hu na aap alag se jo cheeze hain mail kar mail kar hi diya hai.
Customer: Chaliye theek hai sir. Ab isme koi dusri cheez to nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's phone number and email ID lost.

- Wants to close ads and get a refund.

- Wants to talk to the owner.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the email received.

- Explained the email was sent by accountant.

- Executive stated he is talking on behalf of owner.



Next Steps: 

None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, email, accountant, gst, phone
